content: ***set the perfect scene when you add the matilda afghan + pillow to your reading ritual *** reading can transport you to another place and so can crochet cuddle under this chunky afghan that s sized perfectly for one person then recline on the matching pillow a generous 18 and try your best not to catch some zzzz s play with bold color palettes with this fun and versatile crochet pattern **materials** -7 colors of bulky #5 yarn sample uses lion brand hue + me -6 5mm and 8mm crochet hooks -scissors -tapestry needle -steam blocking supplies **techniques** -linen stitch squares -seaming motifs -color changes -crochet finishing measurements one size - blanket measures 52 long x 52 wide pillow measures 18 square // buy more save more // use these codes to save when you buy multiple patterns - saveon3 to save 10% off 3 patterns - saveon5 to save 15% off 5 patterns - saveon8 to save 20% off 8 patterns add all patterns to cart for discount limit one use per purchase
